Package gov.tak.platform.engine.net

Interface CentralTrustManager.CertificatePrompt

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CertificateManager.CentralTrustManager.CertificatePrompt
    Enclosing class:
    CentralTrustManager
    public static interface CentralTrustManager.CertificatePrompt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean promptToAccept​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] certs)
      Callback that can be used to prompt the user to make use of self signed certs of length 1 generated for example, by this little gem:
      boolean promptToUseSystemTrustManager​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] certs)
      Callback that can be used to prompt the user to make use of the System TrustStore.

    • Method Detail

      • promptToUseSystemTrustManager

        boolean promptToUseSystemTrustManager​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] certs)
        Callback that can be used to prompt the user to make use of the System TrustStore.
        Parameters:
        certs - are the certs passed in so the user can decide if to accept them or not.

      • promptToAccept

        boolean promptToAccept​(java.security.cert.X509Certificate[] certs)
        Callback that can be used to prompt the user to make use of self signed certs of length 1 generated for example, by this little gem:

        openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout mysitename.key -out mysitename.crt

        Parameters:
        certs - are the certs passed in so the user can decide if to accept them or not.
